entry.title: More good news!
entry.content:
Good news are rolling! The Czech Science Foundation has also supported my project Probing Chiral Dynamics on Femtosecond Timescales through the JUNIOR STAR scheme. I feel honored!

Here is a link to the news by the Czech Science Foundation.
entry.summary: Good news are rolling! The Czech Science Foundation has also supported my project Probing Chiral Dynamics on Femtosecond Timescales through the JUNIOR STAR scheme. I feel honored!

entry.title: Yay, first grant!
entry.content: I have a good news to share: my project Probing Chiral Dynamics on Femtosecond Timescales has been supported by the Institutional Research Support - Dagmar Procházková Fund at University of Chemistry and Technology, Prague. Through this support, I will be able to set up a new research group at the Department of Physical Chemistry there. Looking forward to the adventure!
entry.summary: I have a good news to share: my project Probing Chiral Dynamics on Femtosecond Timescales has been supported by the Institutional Research Support - Dagmar Procházková Fund at University of Chemistry and Technology, Prague. Through this support, I will be able to set up a new research group at the Department of Physical Chemistry there. Looking forward to the adventure!
